attributes.action: Knight Captain Tom Moore the WW2 veteran for raising charitable funds for NHS
attributes.additional_details: At time of writing, this unbelievable 99 year old war veteran has raised circa 9 million pounds for the NHS during the unprecedented coronavirus pandemic. His feat and will are what personifies everything about The United Kingdom and our national spirit.
attributes.background: In the next honours list, make Captain Tom Moore a knight of the realm.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
